actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend title V of the Housing Act of 1949 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to provide for the establishment of escrow accounts for taxes and insurance by borrowers under that title.

summary.text: Amends the Housing Act of 1949 to make family corporations eligible for farm ownership loans under the Farmers Home Program. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to set up escrow accounts in connection with rural housing loans for the purpose of prepaying taxes and insurance.

titles.title: A bill to amend title V of the Housing Act of 1949 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to provide for the establishment of escrow accounts for taxes and insurance by borrowers under that title.
